title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
Meet the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (HX3681/24) in sleek black—your fast track to a brighter, healthier smile. Powered by Sonicare technology, it removes up to 3x more plaque than a manual toothbrush for a deeper clean you can feel from day one.

What you’ll love:
- Smarter protection for your gums: The built-in pressure sensor flashes red to gently coach you if you’re brushing too hard—helping prevent gum recession.
- Guided, dentist-recommended clean: The SmarTimer ensures a full 2-minute clean, while the QuadPacer prompts you to move to each section of your mouth for even, thorough coverage.
- Comfortable control: Choose from 2 intensity settings and enjoy a slim, ergonomic handle with a familiar-shaped head that feels natural from the first brush.
- Effortless daily routine: Consistent, effective cleaning in just 2 minutes—so simple, it’s easy to stick with.

What’s in the box:
- Philips Sonicare 4100 rechargeable electric toothbrush (HX3681/24)
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head
- 1 USB charger (wall adaptor not included)

Upgrade your oral care with a toothbrush that thinks ahead—gentle on gums, tough on plaque, and designed to make every brush count. Clean, confident, and Sonicare strong.
